items.content_html: Demo AWS Photo App A simple photo storage and AI recognition app. The app allows users to sign up, login, logout, upload pictures and the identifies the objects on the picture using AWS Rekognition AI Service. AWS S3 AWS Lambda AWS Cloud Front AWS Cognito AWS IAM AWS Route 53 React Javascript Python Terraform

items.content_html: This sample demonstrates the use of the Chime SDK React components together with an AppSync local resolver implemented with the "None" data source to provide GraphQL mutation driven subscription notifications without being backed by a persistent data store. It is a simple video chat React UI built and deployed using the AWS CDK.

It is a simple video chat React UI built and deployed using the AWS CDK.
